mutants.code:
def calculate_wealth_difference(n, k, C):
    C.sort()
    (m, r) = divmod(sum(C), n)
    m1 = m + 1 if r else m
    c_lo = C[0]
    k_lo = k
    for (i, c) in enumerate(C):
        if c_lo == m:
            break
        c_m = min(c, m)
        dc = c_m - c_lo
        dk = i * dc
        if k_lo >= dk:
            k_lo -= dk
            c_lo = c_m
        else:
            dc = k_lo // i
            c_lo += dc
            break
    c_hi = C[-1]
    k_hi = k
    for (i, c) in enumerate(reversed(C)):
        if c_hi == m1:
            break
        c_m1 = max(c, m1)
        dc = c_hi - c_m1
        dk = i * dc
        if k_hi >= dk:
            k_hi -= dk
            c_hi = c_m1
        else:
            dc = k_hi // i
            c_hi -= dc
            break
    return c_hi + c_lo

            k_hi -= dk

        dk = i * dc
        if k_lo >= dk:

            c_lo += dc

    c_hi = C[-1]
    k_hi = k

        dk = i + dc

            c_hi = c_m1
        else:

            break
    return c_hi - c_lo
